first_translate: let’s drink up!

hangle: 황태자 때문에 너무 짜증 나서 기분 전환을 꼭 해야겠어!!
first_translate: I’m so annoyed because of that stupid crown prince! I need something to take my mind off things!!!
it's sweet.
fiona, are you there?
is that... alcohol?
have you been drinking?
not enough to get drunk yet...
the real party is about to start now!
come on in. let’s have some drinks together for old times’ sake.
this guy...
drinking alone...
...in his room...

hangle: 3. 아무렇지도 않게 같이 마시자고 방에 들이다니
first_translate: ...and inviting me over like nothing’s wrong...
how can he be this careless all the time?
siegren...
do you have something to tell me?
nope...
really?
what happened to your tie?
were you fighting someone or what?
more or less.
a fight?! but today was supposed to be your debut into high society!
that doesn’t sound like him at all...
or does it?
w-with whom?
nobody important.
fiona...
huh?
it’s hard to see anything since it’s dark out here,
but could you untie this thing for me?

hangle: 시그렌은 어릴 적부터 목에 뭔가 닿는 것 자체를 싫어했지.
first_translate: siegren has always hated having stuff around his neck ever since he was little.
okay.
it shouldn’t be too difficult--
hm?
wait...
the atmosphere feels strange...
let’s hurry up and finish this already.
all done.
now let’s drink!
take it slow. we both know you’re not good with liquor.
by the way, who did you end up getting into a fight with?
the crown prince.
seriously?!
yep. turns out he’s more annoying than expected.
I agree. he really isn’t likable.

hangle: 혹시라도 그 녀석 옆에는 절대 가지 마.
first_translate: stay away from him as much as possible.
alrighty then.

hangle: 개인적으로 부딪힐 일이 없기를 바랄 뿐…
first_translate: I hope our paths never cross again...
huh?
siegren, I think I'm seeing double right now.
you must’ve gotten drunk.
I didn’t...
I told you to pace yourself while drinking.
sleeping peacefully without even knowing how I feel...
sometimes,

hangle: 네 머릿속을 열어 보고 싶다는 생각을 해.
first_translate: I wish I could open up your head and look inside.
why do you care about me so much when you don’t expect anything back?

hangle: 처음 만났을 때부터 줄곧 날 아끼는 이유가 대체 뭘까.
first_translate: even though you haven’t asked me for anything since day one,
there’s no such thing as unconditional love...
to be honest, I still don’t understand you very well.

hangle: 너는 특별히 소중한 것도, 바라는 것도 없어 보여.
first_translate: nothing seems particularly precious or desirable to you.

hangle: 꼭 어디에도 뿌리를 내리지 못한 채 떠도는 민들레 홀씨 같아.
first_translate: you remind me of dandelion seeds floating aimlessly through the air without any place they belong.
I only hope...
...that someday you’ll find something you truly desire.
in the meantime,

hangle: 적어도 지금만큼은 제일 행복한 꿈을 꾸기를.
first_translate: at least may tonight bring you pleasant dreams.
my dearest girl.
your grace,
what if siegren gets bullied by people at the royal palace?

hangle: 그 녀석이 따돌림 좀 당한다고 신경 쓸 성격이더냐.
first_translate: he wouldn’t give two sh*ts even if he got picked on.

hangle: 황자로 인정받아 정식으로 황궁에 잘 들어간 녀석 걱정하지 말고,
first_translate: stop worrying about him. after all, he managed to enter the palace officially as a legitimate son.
start thinking about the upcoming meeting among the five families instead.
meeting among the five families?

hangle: 제국의 대표적인 개국 공신 가문들이 정기적으로 여는 회의다.
first_translate: it’s a regular conference held by the founding families of the empire.
haa...
I still worry about siegren, though.
is that where the meeting will be taking place?
back then, I had no idea...
...the events that would unfold during the meeting...
...would lead me to meet eunice, the original story’s main character,

hangle: 생각지도 못한 사건에 휘말리게 된다는 것을.
first_translate: and drag me into unexpected incidents.
